text:
Herbert Ehrenberg (21 December 1926 – 20 February 2018) was a German politician. He was born in Kollnischken, East Prussia, Weimar Germany. He served as Federal Ministry of Labour and Social Affairs from 1976 through 1982.
Ehrenberg died in Wilhelmshaven, Germany on 20 February 2018 at the age of 91.

annotations.surface_form: Federal Ministry of Labour and Social Affairs
